meanings.definition: Conducive to or suggestive of good health and physical well-being.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables is wholesomer than eating candy.
meanings.sent2: Fresh air and exercise are important for a wholesomer lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The wholesomer choice would be to go for a walk instead of watching TV all day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wholesomer as a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pine trees in the forest was wholesomer than any perfume.
